column4: does anyone use the deskbar applet with ctrl+<spacebar> keybinding?

how does one go about determining what is in control of the keycodes sent by the terminal when doing, say, ctrl+left arrow? I'd like to unify my screenrc bindkey statements across several distros, but each produces a different keycode (^[[1;5D on gentoo, ^[01;5D on ubuntu, eg)
